verses.verse: וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> And they took their journey מֵֽאֵילִ֔ם <WH362> from Elim וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> came כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> and all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> unto the wilderness סִ֔ין <WH5512> of Sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בֵּין־ <WH996> is between אֵילִ֖ם <WH362> which [is] between Elim וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> is between סִינָ֑י <WH5514> and Sinai בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen יוֹם֙ <WH3117> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> of the second לְצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> after their departing out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

[וַיִּלִּינוּ כ] (וַיִּלֹּ֜ונוּ <WH3885> abide ק) כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole עֲדַ֧ת <WH5712> And the whole congregation בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> against מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> against אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and Aaron בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> about בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel מִֽי־ <WH4310> any יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> add מוּתֵ֤נוּ <WH4191> we had died בְיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּשִׁבְתֵּ֙נוּ֙ <WH3427> when we sat עַל־ <WH5921> by סִ֣יר <WH5518> pots הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> by the flesh בְּאָכְלֵ֥נוּ <WH398> [and] when we did eat לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> bread לָשֹׂ֑בַע <WH7648> to the full כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הוֹצֵאתֶ֤ם <WH3318> for ye have brought us forth אֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> into this wilderness הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לְהָמִ֛ית <WH4191> to kill אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> whole הַקָּהָ֥ל <WH6951> this whole assembly הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this בָּרָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> with hunger ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מַמְטִ֥יר <WH4305> Behold I will rain לָכֶ֛ם לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> bread מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> from heaven וְיָצָ֨א <WH3318> shall go out הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> for you and the people וְלָֽקְטוּ֙ <WH3950> and gather דְּבַר־ <WH1697> a certain rate י֣וֹם <WH3117> A day's בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <WH3117> day לְמַ֧עַן <WH4616> because of אֲנַסֶּ֛נּוּ <WH5254> that I may prove הֲיֵלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> will walk בְּתוֹרָתִ֖י <WH8451> in my law אִם־ <WH518> or לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> And it shall come to pass that on the sixth וְהֵכִ֖ינוּ <WH3559> they shall prepare אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> [that] which יָבִ֑יאוּ <WH935> they bring in וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become מִשְׁנֶ֔ה <WH4932> and it shall be twice עַ֥ל <WH5921> as אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> much יִלְקְט֖וּ <WH3950> as much as they gather י֥וֹם ׀ <WH3117> daily יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> day ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and Aaron אֶֽל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עֶ֕רֶב <WH6153> At even וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> then ye shall know כִּ֧י <WH3588> that יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD הוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> hath brought you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> from the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וּבֹ֗קֶר <WH1242> And in the morning וּרְאִיתֶם֙ <WH7200> then ye shall see אֶת־ <WH853> כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּשָׁמְע֥וֹ <WH8085> for that he heareth אֶת־ <WH853> תְּלֻנֹּתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH8519> your murmurings עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD וְנַ֣חְנוּ <WH5168> and what [are] we מָ֔ה <WH4100> and what כִּ֥י <WH3588> for [תַלֹּונוּ כ] (תַלִּ֖ינוּ <WH3885> abide ק) עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> against

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses בְּתֵ֣ת <WH5414> shall give יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> [This shall be] when the LORD לָכֶ֨ם בָּעֶ֜רֶב <WH6153> you in the evening בָּשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> flesh לֶאֱכֹ֗ל <WH398> to eat וְלֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> bread בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> and in the morning לִשְׂבֹּ֔עַ <WH7646> to the full בִּשְׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> heareth יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> תְּלֻנֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8519> your murmurings אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> are we מַלִּינִ֖ם <WH8519> your grumblings עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> against וְנַ֣חְנוּ <WH5168> we מָ֔ה <WH4100> and what לֹא־ <WH3808> are not עָלֵ֥ינוּ <WH5921> against תְלֻנֹּתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH8519> your grumblings כִּ֥י <WH3588> but עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [are] not against us but against the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> unto Aaron אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> Say אֶֽל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַת֙ <WH5712> unto all the congregation בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel קִרְב֖וּ <WH7126> Come near לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> for he hath heard אֵ֖ת <WH853> תְּלֻנֹּתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8519> your murmurings

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כְּדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> And it came to pass as Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> toward כָּל־ <WH3605> to the whole עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> unto the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּפְנ֖וּ <WH6437> that they looked אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> toward the wilderness וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> and behold the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD נִרְאָ֖ה <WH7200> appeared בֶּעָנָֽן׃ <WH6051> in the cloud פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> תְּלוּנֹּת֮ <WH8519> the murmurings בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> speak אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> to לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto them saying בֵּ֤ין <WH996> At הָֽעַרְבַּ֙יִם֙ <WH6153> twilight תֹּאכְל֣וּ <WH398> ye shall eat בָשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> flesh וּבַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> and in the morning תִּשְׂבְּעוּ־ <WH7646> ye shall be filled לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> with bread וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came בָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> And it came to pass that at even וַתַּ֣עַל <WH5927> came up הַשְּׂלָ֔ו <WH7958> the quails וַתְּכַ֖ס <WH3680> and covered אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> the camp וּבַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> and in the morning הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> came שִׁכְבַ֣ת <WH7902> lay הַטַּ֔ל <WH2919> the dew סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> the host

וַתַּ֖עַל <WH5927> was gone up שִׁכְבַ֣ת <WH7902> that lay הַטָּ֑ל <WH2919> And when the dew וְהִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> behold עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> behold upon the face הַמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> of the wilderness דַּ֣ק <WH1851> [there lay] a small מְחֻסְפָּ֔ס <WH2636> round thing דַּ֥ק <WH1851> [as] small כַּכְּפֹ֖ר <WH3713> as the hoar frost עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> on the ground

וַיִּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> saw בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> [it] they said אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִיו֙ <WH251> to another מָ֣ן <WH4478> It [is] manna ה֔וּא <WH1931> he כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> for they wist מַה־ <WH4100> what ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> not what it [was] And Moses אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about ה֣וּא <WH1931> It הַלֶּ֔חֶם <WH3899> unto them This [is] the bread אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD לָכֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> you to eat

זֶ֤ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לִקְט֣וּ <WH3950> Gather מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> of it אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> of it every man לְפִ֣י <WH6310> according אָכְל֑וֹ <WH400> to his eating עֹ֣מֶר <WH6016> an omer לַגֻּלְגֹּ֗לֶת <WH1538> for every man מִסְפַּר֙ <WH4557> [according to] the number נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5315> of your persons אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> ye every man לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> those בְּאָהֳל֖וֹ <WH168> for [them] which [are] in his tents תִּקָּֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> take

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did כֵ֖ן <WH3651> so בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיִּלְקְט֔וּ <WH3950> so and gathered הַמַּרְבֶּ֖ה <WH7235> some more וְהַמַּמְעִֽיט׃ <WH4591> some less

וַיָּמֹ֣דּוּ <WH4058> And when they did mete בָעֹ֔מֶר <WH6016> [it] with an omer וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> had no הֶעְדִּיף֙ <WH5736> had nothing over הַמַּרְבֶּ֔ה <WH7235> he that gathered much וְהַמַּמְעִ֖יט <WH4591> and he that gathered little לֹ֣א <WH3808> had no הֶחְסִ֑יר <WH2637> had no lack אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לְפִֽי־ <WH6310> according אָכְל֖וֹ <WH400> to his eating לָקָֽטוּ׃ <WH3950> they gathered

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> Let no man אַל־ <WH408> no יוֹתֵ֥ר <WH3498> leave מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> any עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> of it till the morning

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Notwithstanding they hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> not unto Moses וַיּוֹתִ֨רוּ <WH3498> of them left אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH582> but some מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> of it עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> of it until the morning וַיָּ֥רֻם <WH7311> and it bred תּוֹלָעִ֖ים <WH8438> worms וַיִּבְאַ֑שׁ <WH887> and stank וַיִּקְצֹ֥ף <WH7107> was wroth עֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> and Moses

וַיִּלְקְט֤וּ <WH3950> And they gathered אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> it every morning בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> morning אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man כְּפִ֣י <WH6310> according אָכְל֑וֹ <WH400> to his eating וְחַ֥ם <WH2552> waxed hot הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> and when the sun וְנָמָֽס׃ <WH4549> it melted

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשִּׁשִּׁ֗י <WH8345> And it came to pass [that] on the sixth לָֽקְט֥וּ <WH3950> they gathered לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> as much bread מִשְׁנֶ֔ה <WH4932> twice שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> two הָעֹ֖מֶר <WH6016> omers לָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for one וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came כָּל־ <WH3605> all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> [man] and all the rulers הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the congregation וַיַּגִּ֖ידוּ <WH5046> and told לְמֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to ה֚וּא <WH1931> This אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is what דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto them This [is that] which the LORD שַׁבָּת֧וֹן <WH7677> [is] the rest שַׁבַּת־ <WH7676> sabbath קֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מָחָ֑ר <WH4279> To morrow אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what תֹּאפ֞וּ <WH644> bake אֵפ֗וּ <WH644> [that] which ye will bake וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> what תְּבַשְּׁלוּ֙ <WH1310> [to day] and seethe בַּשֵּׁ֔לוּ <WH1310> that ye will seethe וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and that which הָ֣עֹדֵ֔ף <WH5736> remaineth over הַנִּ֧יחוּ <WH3240> lay up לָכֶ֛ם לְמִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> for you to be kept עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> until the morning

וַיַּנִּ֤יחוּ <WH3240> And they laid it up אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> till the morning כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> bade מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> as Moses וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הִבְאִ֔ישׁ <WH887> and it did not stink וְרִמָּ֖ה <WH7415> neither was there any worm לֹא־ <WH3808> nor הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> become בּֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אִכְלֻ֣הוּ <WH398> Eat הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> that to day כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is a שַׁבָּ֥ת <WH7676> [is] a sabbath הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> for to day לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD הַיּ֕וֹם <WH3117> to day לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תִמְצָאֻ֖הוּ <WH4672> ye shall not find בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> it in the field
